alert.note: Alert for Starr (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 05 at 2:19PM CDT by NWS Brownsville
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of central Starr County through 300 PM CDT... At 218 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Viboras, moving south at 30 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Viboras, Garciasville, La Grulla, La Puerta, Alto Bonito, La Victoria, Grulla Middle School, La Casita and Rio Grande City--roma. This includes US Highway 83 between mile markers 826 and 836. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. A Severe Thunderstorm Watch remains in effect until 600 PM CDT for Deep South Texas.
